Package ui

Class OptionListMenu<T extends Listable>

java.lang.Object
ui.Menu
ui.OptionMenu
ui.OptionMenuWithResult<T>
ui.OptionListMenu<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the item in the list.
public class OptionListMenu<T extends Listable> extends OptionMenuWithResult<T>
OptionMenu for selecting an item from a arraylist.

Uses pages to show only a certain number of items at a time, and allows the user to change the page to show different items.

Item type must implement Listable in order to be used.

See OptionListMenu#OptionListMemu(LearningManagementSystem, RunnableSelectListItem) for creating the menu.

Runs RunnableSelectListItem#selectItem(T) whenever the item is selected.

Note: It is possible an item isn't selected if a user chooses "Exit"

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Isaac Fleetwood

      public OptionListMenu​(UIManager uiManager)
      Used to create the quiz list menu.
      Parameters:
      lms - Used for accessing QuizManager to get the list of quizzes.
      runnableSelectListItem - Used as a callback function for whenever a quiz is selected. RunnableSelectListItem#selectQuiz(Quiz) is ran whenever a quiz is selected.
